item.title: Time to talk about this website!
item.description: For this 100th SilicoNote/post, I have decided to share some notes about this website : its story and a few details about how I built the last version of it. The short story behind my website As far as I remembered, I have built 5 different versions of my personal website. I decided to get a website when I was doing my PhD, back in 2014 (not a 100% about sure about the timeline), in order to share some of my work.
